KeyTable.Comment: Console: MFB release between 0-1750 ms ---> play-pause
Console: MFB repeat release twice within 500ms ---> next track
Console: MFB repeat release thrice within 500ms ---> prev track
Console: MFB release after 1750 ms ---> Network Standby
Console: MFB+Aux press and hold for at least 500ms ---> AP Mode
Console: MFB+VolumeUp press and hold for at least 500ms ---> Manual Update
Console: MFB+Bluetooth press and hold for at least 500ms ---> Disable Networking
Console: MFB+VolumeDown press and hold for at least 10000ms ---> Factory Reset
Console: MFB press and hold for at least 15000ms ---> Low Power Standby
Console: Bluetooth release ---> CarouselList-Discoverable-ConnectToLast
Console: Bluetooth Press and Hold ---> SendToDiscoverable
Console: Bluetooth Press and Hold ---> Clear Pairing List
Console: VolumeUp(+) release ---> VolumeUp
Console: VolumeUp(+) Press and Hold ---> VolumeUp
Console: VolumeUp(-) release ---> VolumeDown
Console: VolumeUp(-) Press and Hold ---> VolumeDown
Console: AUX release ---> SendToAux
Console: Action release ---> Alexa
Console: Preset 1 press and hold for at least 1000ms ---> Store Currently playing into Preset 1
Console: Preset 2 press and hold for at least 1000ms ---> Store Currently playing into Preset 2
Console: Preset 3 press and hold for at least 1000ms ---> Store Currently playing into Preset 3
Console: Preset 4 press and hold for at least 1000ms ---> Store Currently playing into Preset 4
Console: Preset 5 press and hold for at least 1000ms ---> Store Currently playing into Preset 5
Console: Preset 6 press and hold for at least 1000ms ---> Store Currently playing into Preset 6
Console: Preset 1 release ---> Select Preset stored on Key 1
Console: Preset 2 release ---> Select Preset stored on Key 2
Console: Preset 3 release ---> Select Preset stored on Key 3
Console: Preset 4 release ---> Select Preset stored on Key 4
Console: Preset 5 release ---> Select Preset stored on Key 5
Console: Preset 6 release ---> Select Preset stored on Key 6
